name: Prolbl
description:
Prolbl is a 2D sidescrolling challenge platformer with an emphasis on movement and pixel perfect maneuvering. Jump and slide your way through 11 unique levels to reach the end. 

This is my first completed game. Started off as an experiment but morphed into something I wanted to finish to prove to myself I could. Hope you can find a little enjoyment in it regardless. 

[GAME MUST BE PLAYED IN FULLSCREEN]

CONTROLS:
A and D = Left/Right 

W = Jump

S = Slam

All music, sound, art, and code by WoolyDrool

https://twitter.com/woolydrool

https://woolydrool.bandcamp.com/
